1.0.11.name: wordpress/scribe
1.0.11.description:
Scribe is a professional content marketing application designed for online content creators.

Developed by Copyblogger Media , Scribe makes it easy to conduct in-depth research that helping writers and content producers to quickly identify content marketing opportunities for search and social media traffic and leads.

Once you have performed your research, Scribe’s Content Analysis provides a fast yet intuitive way to check the alignment of your writing to the content on your site – helping you quickly insure that your content and site are focused on the terms that make up your content marketing strategy. You can then optimize the elements of your on-page content for maximum relevance for search rankings.

Finally Scribe’s Site Connector tool provides a simple way for you to find bloggers and social media users that share a similar interest in the topics your site is foc
